%text Mathematical notation might look confusing but is nothing more than short-hand.
Get familiar with at least the basic symbols like $\therefore$ (therefore), $\because$ (because), $\forall$ (for all), $\mathbb{R}$ (real numbers), $\mathbb{Z}$ (integers), $\sum$ (sum) etc.
Once you do, you will be able to express complex ideas \underline\text{quickly and precisely}. %
